title: Windows XP Pro SP3 Black Edition v.2015.4.19(x86)Eng-Rus-AppzDam
description:
WindowsÃ‚Â® XP Pro SP3 Black Edition with automatic installation and updates for April 2015. Integrate all drivers SATA / ACHI, LAN, WLAN and Chipset and more. The system is fully optimized for performance.

Cusp :

1. Integrate all the latest updates / fixes Windows XP POSReady 2009 to April 14, 2015 (will also automatically receive new Windows XP (POSReady 2009) Updates until April 2019 and no Windows XP Activation or Crack or CD-Key is needed.)
2. Also included are over 140 MB of additional SATA / AHCI, LAN drivers and including with some Themes, Runtimes, Patches, Tweaks, Fixes and some optional Programs and Pre-Configured Settings.
3. A Help file is also included in the ISO / Disc folder "..  OEM  WINXPPx86BE" with lots of useful information, such as on how to install Windows XP with an USB Flash Drive and on how to integrate your own SATA / AHCI drivers and much more.

Windows XP Fixes:
Ã¢â‚¬Â¢ Fixed Missing ClipBook Viewer shortcut in the Start Menu (accessor.inf).
Ã¢â‚¬Â¢ Fixed Changing of the Internet and E-mail item on the Start Menu (shlwapi.dll / KB2926765-> KB975713).
Added Runtime Library:
Ã¢â‚¬Â¢ Flash Player ActiveX Control v17.0.0.169 - {Optional}.
Ã¢â‚¬Â¢ Flash Player Netscape Plugin v17.0.0.169 - {Optional}.
Patches:
Ã¢â‚¬Â¢ Extended Update Support Patch v1.0: Extends the Windows XP update support from "April 2014" till "April 2019" (POSReady 2009 Updates).
Ã¢â‚¬Â¢ TCP / IP Patch v1.0: Allows you to have 16777215 (Maximum) Half-Open TCP Connections instead of 10.
Ã¢â‚¬Â¢ UxTheme Patch v1.0: Allows you to use un-signed Custom Visual Styles (Themes).
Ã¢â‚¬Â¢ TermSrv Patch v1.0: Allows you to have multiple concurrent remote desktop connections.
Ã¢â‚¬Â¢ SFC Patch v1.0: Allows you to disable and enable the Windows File Protection with the registry entry "SfcDisable".
Ã¢â‚¬Â¢ SndRec32 Patch v1.0: Increases the recording time limit of the Sound Recorder from 60 seconds to 999 seconds.
Ã¢â‚¬Â¢ dotNET 4 NGEN Patch v3.1: Fixes a Microsoft .NET Framework 4 bug that causes a slow Windows XP boot up.
Ã¢â‚¬Â¢ NTDETECT Patch v1.1: Resolves problems with some buggy BIOS'es, when installing Windows XP with an USB Flash Drive.
Ã¢â‚¬Â¢ RAID-5 Patch v1.0: Enables Software RAID-5 Support.
Ã¢â‚¬Â¢ SERVICES Patch v1.0: Includes more assigned port numbers for well-known services defined by IANA.
Tweaks:
Ã¢â‚¬Â¢ Pre-Configured Windows XP and Program Settings - {Optional}.
Ã¢â‚¬Â¢ Suppressing Microsoft Update nagging to install Windows Genuine Advantage Notifications v1.9.40.0 (KB905474).
Ã¢â‚¬Â¢ Suppressing Microsoft Update nagging to install Windows XP End Of Service Notifications (KB2934207).
Ã¢â‚¬Â¢ Suppressing Microsoft Update nagging to install Windows Malicious Software Removal Tool v5.23.11300.0 (KB890830)
